pr_title: Updating libraries with dependency vulnerable to CVE-2020-11612

timeline.message:
Updating libraries with dependency vulnerable to CVE-2020-11612

Updating a library that has a dependency library vulnerable to https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-11612

timeline.bodyText: iirc. we don't update this one because it isn't managed by our versioning system yet. @JimSuplizio?
timeline.author: conniey

replies.bodyText: I updated all of the async-http-clients with the older versions I could find, ultimately I only needed servicebus fixed as it was flagged by our IT Security Department for not being in compliance, and I didnt want to leave different versions of the same library in the repo.
replies.author: wcom939
